issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: HBase client brings down YARN node manager when it tries to register JvmMetrics in the hadoop metrics system

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: NM does not reference the singleton JvmMetrics instance in its NodeManagerMetrics. This will easily cause NM to crash if any of the node manager components tries to register JvmMetrics. An example of this is TimelineCollectorManager that hosts a HBaseClient that registers JvmMetrics again. See HBASE-19409 for details.
fields.summary: NM should reference the singleton JvmMetrics instance

There is no assertions in {{testReferenceOfSingletonJvmMetrics}}.

Would we want to check that the same instance is returned before and after calls to {{initSingleton}}? Before and after starting a NM?
Thanks [~mdrob@cloudera.com] for the review. I updated the patch accordingly.
[~mdrob], the patch is updated according to your quick review!
